author: zwoop
msg: TS-924 More efficient sharing of origin connections.
This also overloads the config for shared connections as follows:
#  1 - Share, with a single global connection pool
#  2 - Share, with a connection pool per worker thread
This option is now per-request (remap or plugin) overridable.

author: kwright
msg: Fix for CONNECTORS-202.  Add ability to set the commit within parameter for Solr.

msg: resolved generic types warnings - if Helper<?, A, T> can not  be assumed

msg: CAMEL-4357 Also moving MainSupport to main as it needs the same references like the view package
